product_name: CliniqueAll About Clean 2-in-1 Face Cleansing + Exfoliating Jelly Cleanser with Salicylic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique All About Clean 2-in-1 Face Cleansing + Exfoliating Jelly Cleanser is a deep-cleaning gel face cleanser that helps remove buildup from pollution and other impurities.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin TypesTwo-in-one gel face wash formula with two kinds of exfoliants: salicylic acid and bamboo beadsDesigned to be more powerful than a cleanser alone, yet is gentle enough for everyday useLeaves skin feeling smooth and refreshed with a radiant glowKey IngredientsSalicylic Acid: Powerful exfoliant helps clear dead skin cells that can contribute to clogged poresSilica Beads and Bamboo Powder: Physical exfoliants aid in the removal of dead surface skin cellsFeaturesDermatologist testedParaben-free, phthalate-freeAllergy tested, 100% fragrance freeMore sustainable packaging:150ml is made with minimum 55% post-consumer recycled material and 22% plant-derived plastic 30ml is made with minimum 47% post-consumer recycled material and 30% plant-derived plasticCaps are 25% post-consumer recycled materialItem 2576542How To UseWet face and hands.Dispense dime sized amount of face cleanser into hands.Work into a lather and massage over skin.Rinse well several times with lukewarm water.Avoid eye area.Follow with Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator MoisturizerIngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Silica, Acrylates Copolymer, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Butylene Glycol, Sucrose, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Bambusa Arundinacea (Bamboo) Stem Extract, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Caffeine, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Acetyl Glucosamine, Sodium Coco Pg-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Salicylic Acid, Laureth-2, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Chloride, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Sodium Sulfate, Monosodium Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, BHT, EDTA, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Wet face and hands.Dispense dime sized amount of face cleanser into hands.Work into a lather and massage over skin.Rinse well several times with lukewarm water.Avoid eye area.Follow with Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator Moisturizer
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: best face wash
reviews.comments: This is the best face wash! It has the perfect amount of scrubbers in it that it doesn't irritate my face or over exfoliate.

reviews.comments: Love it!

reviews.headline: My fav face wash
reviews.comments: I love this face wash, its the perfect amount of exfoliation and leaves my skin feeling so refeshed and smooth.

reviews.headline: My favorite Clinique cleanser
reviews.comments: This cleanser is amazing. I use it 2-3 times a week, at night, as my cleansing exfolliant. It is gentle but effective.

reviews.headline: Good face scrub
reviews.comments: This is a good face scrub but it's definitely more on the mild side of exfoliation properties.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail Cleanser
reviews.comments: I bought this with my own money. This is the best "polishing" cleanser out there, intended to be used every day. My skin loves this. Breakouts can be expected as it exfoliates and releases trapped comedones but after two weeks, I had no problems. To me, this is a perfect cleanser. I will buy this forever and PRAY they do not change the formula or discontinue!

reviews.headline: Best exfoliation wash
reviews.comments:
I've been using.
 This for many years, I love the light exploration and the clean results. I get with my skin.

reviews.headline: Glad I found this product
reviews.comments: I have tried a few of the clinique scrubs and I prefer this one.  I like that it comes in a gell and it doesn't feel too harsh but yet does a good job of refining skin

reviews.headline: I am enjoying this product!
reviews.comments: This product does a great job cleaning my face!

reviews.headline: Good Product
reviews.comments: I like this product a lot. I like the combination of salicylic acid & a mild exfoliant for my prone to break outs skin.

reviews.headline: Magic
reviews.comments: The Clinique acne foam cleanser has been out of stock so I was forced to try something else and im so GLAD I switched to this . My stubborn acne and pumpy patches are totally gone after 3 days !!! I use the toner and dramatically different moisturizer with it . This is the best my skin has looked in 20 years . I wish i took a before and after picture  because the results are amazing its like magic .

reviews.headline: I have purchased this product over and over again
reviews.comments: This cleanser has just the right amount of exfoliate and Cleaning power to make my face feel brand new every time I use it

reviews.headline: Great exfoliater
reviews.comments: Alittle goes a long way. If you use too much it's hard to rinse off but other than that it exfoliates, cleanses and makes my skin soft. I'm 44. I recommend.

reviews.headline: The absolute best for my overly sensitive face!
reviews.comments: My face is overly sensitive, and dramatic about it. This is the only cleanser I can use. I use it almost daily with no problem.

media.headline: I would not buy this again
media.caption: Where my face broke out

faceoff_positive.comments: I am 59 years young.  I have had two major bouts with severe acne in my adult life where I required Accutane.  I have struggled to find a really great cleanser for my skin to alleviate the breakouts and really take away the blackheads which lead to breakouts.  I am still under the care of a derm but treatment has not been perfect.  I tried this product with much doubt.  Boy was I wrong!! This takes awake the blackheads (I following cleansing with the Clinique Clarifying lotion) and makes my skin so much clearer and youthful looking.  I get impacted blackheads that are awful and the Covid masks make it worse (despite changing everyday), but this cleanser takes care of everything. I have been using it twice a day, but will caution that you may have to go to one of the other Clinique cleansers as twice a day may be a bit harsh for sensitive skin.  I used Clinique in college and moved away from it for some reason.  Glad I am back.
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing Product

faceoff_negative.comments:
I am looking for a few new skin scrubs and potions :) As I look at the ingredients in each I was thrilled to see no Shea (a tree nut which many people react to! - if you notice any hives, itching, redness, swelling, or even additional bumps/breakouts, check your label for Shea!) as well as thrilled to see no almond or other nuts! 
That said, I was very surprised to see BHT on the list for this product! It is banned in many countries and still "up for discussion" in the USA as an additive in cosmetics. There are scientific abstracts which show in numerous studies that this chemically produced additive can cause potential reactions. (Ingesting it is a whole other issue) Clinique, you are the go to, the leader in safe, pure skincare and cosmetics. It would be fabulous if your engineers could revisit ingredient lists and remove harsh chemicals and overlooked allergens. (Lavender, chamomile, almond, walnut, shea, moringa, marula, and argan are all high on the list of supposed "great for your skin" allergens) 
Please always remain as clean, safe, and pure as you are!!
PS Calyx has been my "go to" fragrance for over 20 years whenever I know I will be outdoors with a lot of mosquitoes! Especially when I'm golfing! Bugs HATE green scents! Calyx not only smells fantastic, it helps keep those pesky buggers away! Bravo! (Could you please add powder to the Calyx line?)
faceoff_negative.headline: Why is BHT an ingredient?
